types:type.name: jsondata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type jsondata = {| employeedetils: {| employee1: {| name: String, lastname: String, report: String |}, employee2: {| name: String, lastname: String, reporting: String |}, employee3: {| name: String, lastname: String, report: String |}, employee4: {| name: String, lastname: String, report: String |} |} |} {"example": "{\\\"employeedetils\\\":{\\\"employee1\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"ashok\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"rachapudi\\\",\\\"report\\\":\\\"thirisha\\\"},\\\"employee2\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"siva\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"kundurthi\\\",\\\"reporting\\\":\\\"thirisha\\\"},\\\"employee3\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"supriya\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"kuppala\\\",\\\"report\\\":\\\" vamsi\\\"},\\\"employee4\\\":{\\\"name\\\":\\\"sai\\\",\\\"lastname\\\":\\\"veenapu\\\",\\\"report\\\":\\\" vamsi\\\"}}}"}

types:type.name: exceldata
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type exceldata = {| frnds?: Array<{| name: String, age: Number, gender: String, designation: String, location: String |}> |}

types:type.name: movies
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type movies = {| movies: Array<{| name: String, hero: String, team: {| director: String, music: String, producer: String, banner: String |} |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"movies\\\":[{\\\"name\\\":\\\"bahubali\\\",\\\"hero\\\":\\\"prabhas\\\",\\\"team\\\":{\\\"director\\\":\\\"rajamouli\\\",\\\"music\\\":\\\"keeravani\\\",\\\"producer\\\":\\\"sobhu\\\",\\\"banner\\\":\\\"arka media\\\"}},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"saho\\\",\\\"hero\\\":\\\"prabhas\\\",\\\"team\\\":{\\\"director\\\":\\\"sujith\\\",\\\"music\\\":\\\"gibran\\\",\\\"producer\\\":\\\"vamsi\\\",\\\"banner\\\":\\\"UVcreations\\\"}},{\\\"name\\\":\\\"radhashyam\\\",\\\"hero\\\":\\\"prabhas\\\",\\\"team\\\":{\\\"director\\\":\\\"radhakrishna\\\",\\\"music\\\":\\\"jusin\\\",\\\"producer\\\":\\\"vamsi\\\",\\\"banner\\\":\\\"UVcreations\\\"}}]}"}
